text: The Barbary falcon (Falco pelegrinoides) is a species of bird. It is a medium- sized falcon about the size of a crow. This bird of prey breeds in the Canary Islands and on the coasts of North Africa. It is mainly resident. It is thought to be related to the peregrine falcon. Category:Birds of Pakistan Category:Birds of Turkey Category:Falconiformes Category:Birds of Africa Category:Birds of Asia
title: Barbary falcon
